channel.title: Scouts UK News
channel.description: Latest news from The Scouts UK

item.title: Hospital Scout Group runs activities for young patients
item.description: Find out how a hospital based Scout Group is bringing adventure to young patients and read tips for setting up a Group in a hospital.

item.title: Allan Simpson: Our candidate for the European Scout Committee
item.description: Read about Allan Simpson's mission to help revitalise, refocus and reconnect the European Scout Region.

item.title: 10 tips for attending a Pride parade with Scouts
item.description: We spoke to Jordan, from Blackpool Scouts, and Kayleigh, from Scouts in Northern Ireland, about their going to Pride parades with Scouts.

item.title: Collaboration to strengthen safeguarding: National Working Group (NWG) and Scouts partner for trauma-informed practices
item.description: Scouts partner with the National Working Group as part of our commitment to involve survivors in our learning and resource development.

item.title: Welcoming our new Chief Volunteer of Wales, Jon Williams
item.description: UK Chief Volunteer Carl Hankinson, is delighted to announce the appointment of Jon Williams as the new Chief Volunteer of Wales.

item.title: New Scout and Explorer Money Skills Activity badges have launched with HSBC!
item.description: We're helping young people to learn more about money, from budgeting and interest rates to cryptocurrency and financial risks.
